title: Golden Lux 50 Watch Faces Pack
summary: Amazing 50 golden watch faces pack for sports, travel, nautical & motor lovers.
description: Wear an elegant and luxurious gold watch face !Choose between different golden simple and elegant themes : sports, travel, nautical, motorcycles, cars, airplanes, music, etc. It contains 50 unique gold watch faces with a luxury distinction.It is designed for all types of watches, both round and square.After installing the application on Android Wear you could select the watch face set named as "Gold Watch Faces". You can change from the current watch face in the pack to the next by tapping anywhere.Features:* Includes 50 different watch faces.* Interactive watch faces: tap to change the current watch face to the next.* A padlock to lock the face you like.* Available for all kind of watches (compatible with Moto360, LG G Watch R, Sony smart watches,…).* Designed for round and square watches.* Energy saving management with the ambient mode to save & increase the battery life.* Compatible with Android 6 (Marshmallow).The app uses the interactive functionality to change the watch face tapping anywhere in the screen except in a padlock that you can find in the upper right corner.You can lock the watch face you've selected tapping the padlock (closing it). If you tap the padlock again (opening it) you could change the watch face.Google includes the possibility of the interactive watch faces, so your Android Wear should be updated in order to use it. Make sure that the Android Wear version is 1.3 as minimum.Android Wear: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.google.android.wearable.appIf you encounter problems or you have comments, please send an email to info@simplesapps.com.Now you can wear an elegant, simple and luxurious gold watch face.
descriptionHTML:
Wear an elegant and luxurious gold watch face !

Choose between different golden simple and elegant themes : sports, travel, nautical, motorcycles, cars, airplanes, music, etc. It contains 50 unique gold watch faces with a luxury distinction.

It is designed for all types of watches, both round and square.

After installing the application on Android Wear you could select the watch face set named as "Gold Watch Faces". You can change from the current watch face in the pack to the next by tapping anywhere.

Features:

* Includes 50 different watch faces.
* Interactive watch faces: tap to change the current watch face to the next.
* A padlock to lock the face you like.
* Available for all kind of watches (compatible with Moto360, LG G Watch R, Sony smart watches,…).
* Designed for round and square watches.
* Energy saving management with the ambient mode to save & increase the battery life.
* Compatible with Android 6 (Marshmallow).

The app uses the interactive functionality to change the watch face tapping anywhere in the screen except in a padlock that you can find in the upper right corner.

You can lock the watch face you've selected tapping the padlock (closing it). If you tap the padlock again (opening it) you could change the watch face.

Google includes the possibility of the interactive watch faces, so your Android Wear should be updated in order to use it. Make sure that the Android Wear version is 1.3 as minimum.
Android Wear: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.google.android.wearable.app

If you encounter problems or you have comments, please send an email to info@simplesapps.com.

Now you can wear an elegant, simple and luxurious gold watch face.
